DOC.brief_summary: Sentinel lymph node biopsy（SLNB） establish way predict axillary nodal metastasis early breast cancer . We aim determinethe，in prospective randomize , control trial , effect sentinel lymph node biopsy para-sentinel lymph node ( SLN ) dissection versus sentinel lymph node biopsy without para-sentinel lymph node dissection outcome breast surgery .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized , Controlled Trial Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy With Without Para-Sentinel Lymph Node Dissection Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Aim : Compare disease-free survival ( DFS ) overall survival ( OS ) breast cancer patient randomize receive sentinel lymph node biopsy para-sentinel lymph node dissection group vs. receive sentinel lymph node biopsy without para-sentinel lymph node dissection Outline : Patients randomize assign follow one two group follow annually . Arm I : Patients receive sentinel lymph node biopsy para-sentinel lymph node dissection Arm II : Patients receive sentinel lymph node biopsy without para-sentinel lymph node dissection
